text: Eritara Riteti (born 6 August 1982), is a retired I-Kiribati footballer who played as a forward. ==International career== Riteti represented Kiribati at the 2003 Pacific Games. ==Career statistics== === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
